title: Bug 130068[Regression]Report Parameter window doesn't pop up when previewing a report with parameter.
description:
Description: The Report Parameter window should pop up when previewing a report with parameter, but it is not appearing.

Steps to reproduce: 
1. Create a report parameter without a default value.
2. Drag the report parameter to the Layout.
3. Click Preview in Layout.

Observed behavior:
OB: The Report Parameter window does not pop up when previewing the report with the parameter.
SR: The Report Parameter window should pop up for value input when previewing the report with the parameter.
